mapper.insert: insert into evt_scene_cam_rel (SCENE_CAM_REL_ID, EVENT_SCENE_ID, CAMPAIGN_SEQ, MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, LEVEL_CONFIG, WHETHER_CONFIG, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, CREATE_DATE, REMARK) values (#{sceneCamRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{eventSceneId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{campaignSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mktCampaignId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{levelConfig,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{whetherConfig,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update evt_scene_cam_rel set EVENT_SCENE_ID = #{eventSceneId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CAMPAIGN_SEQ = #{campaignSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID = #{mktCampaignId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, LEVEL_CONFIG = #{levelConfig,jdbcType=INTEGER}, WHETHER_CONFIG = #{whetherConfig,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SCENE_CAM_REL_ID = #{sceneCamRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select SCENE_CAM_REL_ID, EVENT_SCENE_ID, CAMPAIGN_SEQ, MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, STATUS_CD, LEVEL_CONFIG, WHETHER_CONFIG,STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, CREATE_DATE, REMARK from evt_scene_cam_rel where SCENE_CAM_REL_ID = #{sceneCamRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select SCENE_CAM_REL_ID, EVENT_SCENE_ID, CAMPAIGN_SEQ, MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, STATUS_CD,LEVEL_CONFIG, WHETHER_CONFIG, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, CREATE_DATE, REMARK from evt_scene_cam_rel

select SCENE_CAM_REL_ID, EVENT_SCENE_ID, CAMPAIGN_SEQ, MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, STATUS_CD,LEVEL_CONFIG, WHETHER_CONFIG, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, CREATE_DATE, REMARK from evt_scene_cam_rel where 1 = 1
and EVENT_SCENE_ID = #{eventSceneId}
